title: Free YouTube Uploader v2.2.1.1 [with batch mode support]
description:
Free YouTube Uploader v2.2.1.1 [with batch mode support]
          ********************************************************

 Is the very first PC desktop application to upload video to YouTube without using the original YouTube web interface.

 If you often upload videos, this easy to use program will be a good companion for you and save lots of your time.

 Also it gives you 100% guaranty that your video will not be rejected by YouTube due to incompatibility reasons.

 Convert any video to YouTube friendly video format with optimal size and quality and upload your video to YouTube fast and easy.

 New version has the batch mode. So you can upload several video files during one session.

How to upload video to YouTube:

Step 1

Download Free YouTube Uploader

 There are no spyware or adware. It&#039;s absolutely safe to install and to run!

Step 2

Launch Free YouTube Uploader

Free YouTube Uploader: upload video to YouTube, batch mode

Follow Start > All Programs > DVDVideoSoft > Free YouTube Uploader or click the DVDVideoSoft Free Studio icon on the desktop and then YouTube Uploader on the left sidebar.

 On the first start up the program will ask you to enter your YouTube account login and password.

Step 3

Open video file to upload to YouTube

Free YouTube Uploader: upload video to YouTube, batch mode

Click the Browse... button to select a video file from your computer.

 Next fill Title, Description, Tags and Video Category fields, which helps other Internet users to find your video on YouTube.

You can click the "switch to a batch mode" link, if you want to upload multiple video files during one session or click the Trim video... button to trim your video before uploading

Then you are ready, click Upload video

 Note: Free YouTube Uploader converts your video to YouTube friendly format with optimal size and quality!!!

Step 4

Trim video

Free YouTube Uploader: upload video to YouTube, batch mode

 Click the Trim video... button along the bottom of the interface to open the new window.

 Use navigation line and special buttons to set start and end selection markers position.

Click Apply & Close to switch back to the main program window.

Step 5

Batch mode

Free YouTube Uploader: upload video to YouTube, batch mode

 Here you can open several files to upload to YouTube. Than fill Title, Description, Tags and Video Category fields*.

When you are ready, click Upload video.

* Note: They will be the same for all uploaded files during this session.

Step 6

Uploading Video

Free YouTube Uploader: upload video to YouTube, batch mode

Wait several minutes.

The uploading time depends on your video duration and Internet connection speed.

 Note: It may take just several seconds to upload video to YouTube, but if your connection is slow, it may take 10 - 20 minutes to upload video. Please be patient.
